summary: Megalopolis is an American science fiction film directed by Francis Ford Coppola. Set in an alternate New York City, called "New Rome," it tells the story of an architect, Cesar Catilina, who dreams of building a futuristic utopia. Catilina clashes with the corrupt mayor, Franklyn Cicero, who opposes his plans. The film references ancient Roman history and explores themes of political conspiracy and the transition from republic to empire. With a troubled production history, Coppola self-funded the $120 million project and reunited with past collaborators. Despite polarizing critics, Megalopolis premiered at the Cannes Film Festival in 2024 and was released worldwide.
title: Megalopolis (film)
